cleaned_text: Nutrition, and Holistic Healing | Mind-Body Therapist and Health Writer Detox is the bed rock of natural medicine. Some people are made to believe that their detox organs, kidneys, liver, colon, are constantly cleaning their bodies and so there is no need for detox. What they fail to tell them is that their diet, lifestyle, chemicals you expose yourself to, and thoughts or emotions can cripple the functions of these organs and they either slow down or stop working totally. You need periodic detoxes if you are living in this present times.
